name: Tabbouleh Pasta Salad
description: Tabbouleh Pasta Salad. Parsley, tomatoes, fusilli pasta dressed with olive oil, salt, pepper and lemon. Fresh Summer Salad. Vegan Soy-free Recipe. Can be made gluten-free with gf pasta.
recipeIngredient: 2   tomatoes (chopped small or 1+ cups of cherry tomatoes, sliced into halfs)
one bunch fresh parsley (finely chopped (1.5 to 2 cups))

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the fusilli according to instructions. Wash in cold water and add to a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the fusilli according to instructions. Wash in cold water and add to a large bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the parsley really well. Chop up the tomatoes, onions, parsley and mint and add to the bowl. Toss well.
recipeInstructions.name: Wash the parsley really well. Chop up the tomatoes, onions, parsley and mint and add to the bowl. Toss well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add salt, pepper, lemon and olive oil, toss well. Chill the salad for atleast an hour (the flavors infuse and improve). Taste and adjust salt and lemon. Add a good pinch of cayenne if you desire. Add a clove of garlic minced and mix in.
